info.additionalInfo: For more Dark and Flat styles click here Update 28/10/2017 - Added few more working domains, not optimize to all of them Update 23/07/2016 - Added the mirror domain kickasstorrents.website Update 17/07/2016 - Hide chat button Update 04/07/2016 - (hopefully) fixed all button in the menus, include forums and polls Update 25/06/2016 - Added new welcome page Update 28/11/2015 - Adjusted the width of the page, addded search box autocomplete Update 14/11/2015 - Fixed pop-ups and advanced search, also fixed some colors Update 07/11/2015 - Added animations, Fixed screenshot button and comment composer Update 06/11/2015 - Added more domains and fixed the verified green crown
